New Records: Jackson Chourio's 3rd game of at least 4 RBI in 2024 ties him behind only 3 single season totals on the list of players younger than 21 in National League history
Key Match Events: Jackson Chourio hit a grand slam in the sixth inning against the St. Louis Cardinals
Post-Match Reflections: The Milwaukee Brewers beat the division-rival St. Louis Cardinals 9-3 on Labor Day Monday
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Brewers will battle it out with the Philadelphia Phillies and Los Angeles Dodgers for the No. 1 overall seed in the National League playoffs
Others: Jackson Chourio figures to finish in the top four of the National League Rookie of the Year voting
